greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Digital root of 3n.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 1).
formula: G.f.: (-3*(1 + 2*x + 3*x^2))/(-1 + x^3) for n>0. - _Alexander R. Povolotsky_, Jun 13 2012
mathematica: digitalRoot[n_Integer?Positive] := FixedPoint[Plus@@IntegerDigits[#]&,n]; Table[If[n==0,0,digitalRoot[3*n]], {n,0,200}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, May 02 2011 *)
results.author: _Odimar Fabeny_, Sep 10 2010
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 23 2010
